name: StarTech ST100S 100 Mb/s Ethernet PCI Network Adapter
Features: [Chipset ID: Realtek 8100C, Maximum Data Transfer Rate: 200 Mbits/Sec, Card Type: Standard Profile, Power Consumption: <= 1.5W, OS Compatibility: NetWare 3.x/4.x, Windows 98SE/ NT/ 2000/ XP(32/64bit)/ Vista(32/64bit)/ 7(32/64bit), MAC OS X and up, and Linux, Compliant with IEEE802.3 CSMA/CD, 802.3 10Base-T and 100Base-TX standards, Early interrupt on transmit support, Note: IRQ and I/O Address assigned by system]
